item.title: [PI] Deposit All Lag
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Okay, why are you loop through twice? I’m not familiar with your code; so I’m unsure why you have the 214700000 as the last parameter, nor why you are looping from 0 - 101. You’re lagging because your code is taking longer than 600ms to execute thus causing the player updating to be delayed.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Deposit All Lag
item.dc:creator: @iHybridu iHybridu
item.description:
@iHybridu wrote:

Why do I lag extremely bad after I deposit my inventory using the deposit all button?

			case 89223: //Deposit Inventory
				for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) {
					for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) {
						c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000);
					}
				}
